headline: Show HN: You can’t rely on motivation to quit social media
description:
How many times did you tell yourself that you will quit social media apps?

I’ve done it multiple times, disabled my Facebook and instagram accounts when I felt motivated to do so, only to enabled them back again whenever my motivation faded and I felt bored.

Now, I don’t think that these social apps are completely evil, if you simply control the amount of time you spend surfing them.

That is why I designed and built an app that helps me limit the amount of time I spend on these apps and so far it has been effective.

The point of the app is simple, to help you reduce your screen time and limit addictive app usage.

I really think that negative reinforcement is one of the best ways to build habits, which is why I included it in this app.

Do you like watching video ads? I’m thinking you hate them.

With this app, you can launch an annoying video ad if you’re about to access one of your blocked apps.

If you find yourself regularly and mindlessly launching social apps, this little app will definitely help you overcome this addiction.

If you are interested in using the app, it’s available for android users.

Disclaimer:

Even though this is an app I built and this might look like self promotion I just want to say that this app has helped me and I think that it can help others as well.

If you can’t afford the application after the free trial, but you find it to be helpful, I will personally help you out with a free version.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 戒除社交媒体不能靠动力
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 戒除社交媒體不能靠動力
description_zh-Hans:
你曾多少次告诉自己要戒掉社交媒体应用程序？

我曾多次这样做，在我感到有动力时禁用我的Facebook和Instagram账户，只是每当我的动力减弱，感到无聊时又重新启用它们。

现在，我不认为这些社交应用程序是完全邪恶的，如果你只是控制你花在浏览上的时间。

这就是为什么我设计并建立了一个应用程序，帮助我限制在这些应用程序上花费的时间，到目前为止，它是有效的。

这个应用程序的重点很简单，帮助你减少你的屏幕时间，限制令人上瘾的应用程序的使用。

我真的认为，负强化是建立习惯的最好方法之一，这就是为什么我在这个应用程序中包含它。

你喜欢看视频广告吗？我想你讨厌它们。

有了这个应用程序，如果你即将访问你的一个被阻止的应用程序，你可以启动一个恼人的视频广告。

如果你发现自己经常无意识地启动社交应用程序，这个小应用程序肯定会帮助你克服这种瘾。

如果你有兴趣使用这个应用程序，它可用于安卓用户。

如果你在免费试用后买不起这个应用程序，但你发现它是有帮助的，我将亲自帮你提供一个免费版本。
